title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.1 - Appointment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.1 - Appointment

State Regulations
(a) The chancellor
shall be appointed by the board of trustees and shall serve at the pleasure of
the board of trustees. (b) At any
time during the period of appointment, the board of trustees may evaluate the
services of the chancellor. (c) The
chancellor, upon appointment, shall be appointed to the faculty of the
university in a position of academic rank with continuing
appointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
328.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
